title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Customized Language Education Design for Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain their dominant learning style through VARK assessment.
Learners achieve over 80% of learning objectives using language materials optimized for their style (visual, auditory, read/write, kinesthetic).
Learners enhance language expression skills through activities based on multiple learning theories (cognitivism, constructivism, behaviorism).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
